name: Thanks
description:
"Thanks" is a exploration/movement game I've been working on in my free time. It has a fun dashing mechanic! Leave a comment if you have any suggestions or questions. Further updates TBD.

Controls are outlined in the pause screen (Esc)

QUICK TIP:  you can toggle "killzones" with Q to turn the game into a The Zone-type maze of invisible hazards, if you're feeling stalker-y.
